title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7040.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7040.1 - Policy

State Regulations

In order to promote a safe, secure, and healthy
correctional environment, there shall be a limit on the total number of inmates
confined at any given time within each local correctional
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7040.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
